SqlOutput.Sql: CASE WHEN ((NVL($!s0s!$.customcheckbox1__c, '0') = '1') AND (NVL($!s0s!$.customcheckbox2__c, '0') = '1')) THEN NVL(CASE WHEN (NVL($!s0s!$.customcheckbox3__c, '0') = '1') THEN NVL($!s0s!$.customdate1__c,TO_DATE(NULL)) ELSE NVL($!s0s!$.customdate2__c,TO_DATE(NULL)) END,TO_DATE(NULL)) ELSE TO_DATE(TO_CHAR(FLOOR(NVL($!s0s!$.customnumber1__c, 0))) || '-' || TO_CHAR(FLOOR(NVL($!s0s!$.customnumber2__c, 0))) || '-' || TO_CHAR(FLOOR(NVL($!s0s!$.customnumber3__c, 0))), 'YYYY-MM-DD') END
